lead_paragraph: Verizon added 565,000 wireless subscribers in the quarter, up 4.8 percent. The company’s first-quarter net income was $4.22 billion, or $1.02 a share.

headline.print_headline: Verizon Tops Forecasts and Defends Cable Packages
headline.main: Verizon Tops Forecasts and Defends Cable Packages

snippet: Verizon added 565,000 wireless subscribers in the quarter, up 4.8 percent. The company’s first-quarter net income was $4.22 billion, or $1.02 a share.
abstract: Verizon reports better-than-expected first-quarter net income of $4.22 billion, or $1.02 a share, up 4.8 percent from year-earlier period.
